English.Text: 'Negligent' falls short to describe your doctor. In an attempt to purge the poisonous fruit from the man's stomach, she pours seawater down the poor officer's mouth. Not only does he howl with pain the second salt touches his inflamed throat, the seawater makes him heave and choke on his blocked airways. The officer convulses and gurgles for five very long minutes before he stops twitching altogether.
